text: Horsfieldia sparsa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree that grows naturally in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia, Singapore and Thailand. ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Horsfieldia sparsa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Horsfieldia sparsa
